Container.Name: OctoEverywhereforBambulab
Container.Overview:
Unofficial Unraid implementation of the official OctoEverywhere Docker image
Feature requests should be directed to https://github.com/QuinnDamerell/OctoPrint-OctoEverywhere/issues
Bugs about this template should be directed to https://github.com/ntebis/unraid_templates/issues

Config.Name: Access Code
Config.Description:
Enter the 8 digit access code of your printer
https://octoeverywhere.com/s/access-code

Config.Name: Printer Serial Number
Config.Description:
Enter the Serial number of the printer. The Serial number is usually 15 digits
https://octoeverywhere.com/s/bambu-sn

Config.Name: Printer IP Address
Config.Description:
Enter the printers IP address
https://octoeverywhere.com/s/bambu-ip

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Set timezone to proper timezone for logs using standard timezones: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones#List
